reviews.title: Quiet oasis for the weary traveller
reviews.text: After 18 hours in the air this hotel room was very welcome. Large room with comfy bed,

reviews.title: Adequate
reviews.text: large hot shower and little extras like toothbrush, moisturiser, coffee maker etc
and the staff were very accommodating.
reviews.title: Clean spacious room with the convenience of not having to leave the terminal

reviews.text: If you need a place to stretch out during a long layover, the Ambassador is a very convenient and inexpensive alternative to trying to sleep in a chair somewhere in the terminal. My room was tiny and slightly stuffy, but clean and quiet. I would book again if I have another long layover.
reviews.title: Basic, but great for a rest in between flights
Basic but comfortable
reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel during a layover in Singapore. I arrived at midnight and had a 9am connection. Checking in was quick and convenient. You get a 6 hour block of time and if you want more time you have to pay for each additional hour ahead of time. No refunds if you don't use it so plan accordingly.
